p: High yields with lower BCP percentages were found for Acalypha fruticosa, Achyrocline alata, Agrimonia eupatoria, Bowdichia virgilioides, Bursera microphylla, Croton pulegiodorus, Curcuma longa, Glechon marifolia, Laser trilobum, Meristotropis xanthioides, Origanum majorana, Pimpinella kotschyana, Piper guineense, Rosa canina, Salvia canariensis, Spondias pinnata, Syzygium aromaticum and Thuja orientalis. All other species had a yield ranging from 0.004 to 1% and a BCP content ranging from 9.8 to 55 % ( Figure 1).
